"Knuckles":
"Knuckles are melee weapons with high agility and damage dealing capability, though they have a short attack range.

If you successfully dodge an attack with their Weapon Action, \"Knuckle Sway\", after learning the Class Skill \"Knuckle Sway Counter\", you will automatically perform a powerful counterattack."

"The PA \"Swift Rush\" lets you close in on a single enemy and deal high damage.

You can chain it into another attack even midway through, letting you respond flexibly to your situation."
